description:
Bring a touch of luxury to the board with the Imperial chess set for Chess Ultra.

Hand crafted and embellished with jewels fit for a King, the Imperial pack contains two exclusive chessmen designs. The Ruby and Emerald set radiates elegance with polished gold adorned with the finest gemstones, whilst the Platinum and Onyx set provides a striking contrast with stylish gunmetal pieces and elegant stones to match.
Make a statement with this exquisite chess set for Chess Ultra.

This pack contains a chess set only, which can be used in any environment in the game.
name: Chess Ultra: Imperial chess set
